details.arabic_diacless: رب اغفر لى ولاخى وادخلنا فى رحمتك ‌ۖوانت ارحم الرٰحمين
details.arabic: رَبِّ اغۡفِرۡ لِىۡ وَلِاَخِىۡ وَاَدۡخِلۡنَا فِىۡ رَحۡمَتِكَ ‌ۖوَاَنۡتَ اَرۡحَمُ الرّٰحِمِيۡنَ
details.transliteration: Rabbi ighfir lee wali akhee wa adkhilna fee rahmatika wa anta arhamur rahimeen
details.translations: My Lord, forgive me and my brother and admit us into Your mercy, for You are the most merciful of the merciful.
